topic: How to document CLI tools using fastapi with Python 3.12+
prompt: Write a Python 3.12+ focused, accurate explainer for: How to document CLI tools using fastapi with Python 3.12+

response_parsed.title: Documenting CLI Tools Using FastAPI in Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This guide demonstrates how to create a well-documented Command Line Interface (CLI) tool using FastAPI, a modern web framework for building APIs, in Python 3.12+.
key_points: FastAPI allows for creating CLI tools as well as traditional web APIs
It offers automatic generation of API documentation
The FastAPI CLI tool is used to generate a CLI application from a FastAPI app
You can customize the generated CLI using decorators, parameters, and responses
version_notes: Python 3.12+ is required for this example
caveats: The generated CLI might not have all the features of a full-fledged CLI library
For advanced CLI functionality, consider using dedicated CLI libraries like Click
